title: Milestone
body:
Hey everyone,
so the other day i was told by my friend that at 1000 wins, you could get a rioter to play with you to help win it. the problem is is far past that, at around 1520 wins rn. would there be any chance that this is still going on today? my friend said a few of you did it for him a few years back now and i was hoping the same could happen for me ^_^
